attributes.action: Allow residents living in rural areas to have access to salt bins to minimise vehicular and pedestrian accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Living in a rural residential area, we are not receiving any road grit/salt to make our roads safe. Rural Norfolk has the most unpaved roads in the country. Our council taxes are the same as for people living in the city and yet we receive a lower standard of service. Please PM, help us to help ourselves and allow us to reduce accidents.
